title: The Man Obstructed by the Steel Frame

infobox.Title:: The Man Obstructed by the Steel Frame
infobox.Japanese title:: 鉄骨に阻まれた男  (Tekkotsu ni Habamareta Otoko)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Wataru Takagi  Debt collector 1  Debt collector 2
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima, Wataru Takagi  Akio Suyama as Daijiro Manaka  Shozo Iizuka as Taizo Ginbayashi  Yoshiyuki Kono as Kazuo Hinuma  Mami Horikoshi as Landlady  Masuo Amada as Debt collector 1  Kozo Mito as Debt collector 2
infobox.Closing song:: Mō Kimi Dake o Hanashitari wa Shinai

sections.Situation: A struggling artist named Daijiro Manaka is nearly killed by a falling steel beam. While he's lying in the hospital, Detective Takagi and the Detective Boys go through his bag and find his license, a rope, a pair of gloves, and a suicide note. Daijiro wakes up and when Takagi asks him about the bag he claims, it happens that he has an amnesia, but Conan notices he is lying. Daijiro's only living relative is his uncle who has refused to help him unless he gives up on being an artist.

sections.Trivia: - Hinuma and Ginbayashi's car is a midnight blue Mercedes-Benz S500 L [W221]. The license plate number is 新宿 300, も 88-64 (Shinjuku 300, Mo 88-64).
